brand_identity.name: PluralSkill
brand_identity.emotional_tone: Structured yet organic. Professional yet warm. Not a cold corporate tool, but a digital garden for skills.
design_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Grid precision with Organic warmth.
Content is King: Every screen tells a story of progress.
Zoom In: Focus on the details of the learning experience.
Negative Space: Let the content breathe. 2x spacing by default.

rules: Headings (H1-H3) must use 'Outfit'. Use weights 600 or 800. Letter-spacing: -0.02em.
Body text must use 'Manrope'. Weight 400 or 500. Line-height: 1.6.

primary.description: Deep Indigo - Represents deep knowledge and focus.

secondary.description: Acid Lime - Represents growth, energy, and new skills. Use for accents, badges, and highlights.

rules: Use the Acid Lime sparingly (badges, active states, tiny accents).
Backgrounds should be off-white (#F9FAFB), not pure white, to reduce eye strain.

layout_system.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6, p-8, p-12 where others use p-4.

grids.marketing: Bento Grid (Mode A). Asymmetric. Mix col-span-4, col-span-8. Use gap-8.
grids.dashboard: High Density (Mode B). Strict grid. gap-4. Cards fill height.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg shadow-indigo-500/20 transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border border-input hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground

cards.marketing: Glassmorphism. bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 shadow-xl shadow-indigo-500/5.
cards.dashboard: Flat. bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow.

inputs.style: bg-slate-50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:bg-white transition-colors rounded-lg h-12

navigation.style: Floating glass header. Sticky. backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 border-b border-slate-200/50.

hero_main.alt: Diverse students collaborating at a table in a modern office
hero_main.usage: Landing page hero section, main visual.

auth_background.alt: Woman focused on work at a desk
auth_background.usage: Split screen background for Login/Signup pages.

instructors.name: Instructor 1
instructors.alt: Professional man in suit working at cafe

rules: Hover effects: Scale 1.02 or 1.05. Never just color change.
Scroll: Use 'whileInView' for section reveals (fade up + blur removal).
Interactive elements must have :focus-visible styles (ring-2 ring-primary ring-offset-2).
All images must have alt text.
Use semantic HTML (main, section, article, nav).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS FIRST: Add the Google Fonts link to public/index.html immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and fonts defined above.
3. BUILD LAYOUTS: Use the 'Bento Grid' logic for the landing page. Don't make it a boring stack of sections.
4. USE IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. DO NOT use placeholders.
5. DASHBOARD: Make it dense but readable. Use the 'High Density' grid rules.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - generic, centered, blue/gray designs.
Use 2-3x more spacing than you think is necessary.
Micro-animations are mandatory for every interaction.
Never use transparent backgrounds without blur/scrim.
